formattedAddress: 42A E 74th St, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 42A E 74th St, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
I recently consulted with Dr. Gartner regarding a facelift, as I was looking for a solution to address signs of aging that I was struggling with. Dr. Gartner was incredibly helpful in devising a surgical plan tailored to my needs and aesthetic goals. He thoroughly explained what I should expect immediately following the surgery, as well as in the days and weeks during the recovery period. His transparency throughout the process was reassuring, and he was always available to answer any questions I had.

I'm currently one week post-op and have just begun the recovery phase. So far, I'm extremely pleased with how everything has gone. I plan to keep updating on my progress, but as of now, I'm very satisfied with the results!

originalText.text:
I had a fantastic experience with Dr. Gartner, no kidding. He made my facelift journey super smooth and actually quite enjoyable. He was a star at helping me manage any discomfort after the surgery and even gave me great advice on skincare and recovery practices to get the best results.

The whole team was just incredible, really going out of their way for me. This whole facelift experience is something I'll always look back on fondly, all thanks to them.

originalText.text:
For years, I was looking for a way to rejuvenate my appearance, which ultimately led me to Dr. Gartner's clinic for a facelift.

During our consultations, we discussed the specific areas of my face that I felt needed refreshing – focusing on my jawline, cheeks, and neck. Dr. Gartner was meticulous in the procedure, ensuring every step was taken with care to minimize discomfort and scarring. I must say, the results have been absolutely transformative - I'M OVER THE MOON! I would highly recommend Dr. Gartner, he took the time to understand my personal needs and goals and I could not thank him enough for that.

originalText.text: For as long as I can remember, my breasts were my biggest insecurity. After a lot of research, I turned to Dr. Gartner, and I couldn't be happier. The shape, the proportion—it's all so naturally me. It's a transformation that feels both subtle and life-changing and gave me my confidence back. Thank you! :)

originalText.text: In my honest opinion this was the best experience I've had in a surgical clinic by far! I've had a good amount of surgeries done in the past, but Dr. Gartner is a surgeon that you will remember forever. He's kind, cares about your opinion and the results you want and knows what's best for your body. After meeting with him, I had complete trust in him. He took his time to explain the surgery to me, it wasn't rushed at all like most doctors do at other clinics. The staff at the front desk are also great and welcoming. 10 out of 10 experience! :)
